definitions.definition: An eruption ; the sudden appearance of a rash , disease , etc.
examples: Any epidemic outbreak causes understandable panic.
There has been an outbreak of vandalism at the school.

definitions.definition: An outburst or sudden eruption , especially of violence and mischief .
examples: There has been an outbreak of broken windows in the street.

definitions.definition: Synonym of breakout ( “ escape from prison ” ) .

main_definition: An eruption ; the sudden appearance of a rash , disease , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) An outburst or sudden eruption , especially of violence and mischief .
Synonym of breakout ( “ escape from prison ” ) .
